text: Bu xinyang zhe shuo:“Women jue bu xiangxin zhe bu “gulanjing”, ye jue bu xiangxin zai ci zhiqian jiang shi de [jingdian].” Yaoshi ni neng kanjian bu yi zhe zhan zai tamen de zhu [an la] nali [shoushen] de qingkuang duo hao a! Tamen jiang huxiang zhize. Ganbaixiafeng zhe jiang dui jiao'ao zi da zhe shuo:“Yao bushi yinwei nimen [de yuangu], women biding chengwei xinshile [zhu].”
